General.Name: C & C Constructions Limited
General.Description: C & C Constructions Limited engages in the construction activities in India and internationally. It constructs roads and highways; power and telecom transmission towers; water supply and sanitation projects; rail infrastructure projects; urban infrastructure projects; concession projects; site locations; and commercial buildings. C & C Constructions Limited was incorporated in 1996 and is based in Gurugram, India.
